FORM.SCRIPT: local wndGear = UISelf:GetControl("FRM_GEAR") if wndGear:IsNil() == false then if fGearTime ~= nil and GetAccumTime() - fGearTime > 0.5 then if iGearNum ~= nil then iGearNum = iGearNum + 1 if iGearNum > 4 then iGearNum = 1 end wndGear:SetUVIndex(iGearNum) end end end

BUTTON.SCRIPT: if true == CheckJoinLevel( UISelf ) then Net_JoinPvP(2) end
if true == CheckJoinLevel( UISelf ) then Net_JoinPvP(3) end
local kPacket = NewPacket(30752) Net_Send(kPacket) DeletePacket(kPacket) UISelf:CloseParent()
BUTTON.HOTKEY: local kPacket = NewPacket(30752) Net_Send(kPacket) DeletePacket(kPacket) UISelf:CloseParent() return true

FULL_FORM.SCRIPT:
local head = "01" if false == IsExerciseType() then head = "2" end
local tail = "0" for i=0,11 do if 10>(i+1) then tail = "0"..(i+1) else tail = tostring(i+1) end UISelf:GetControl("IMG_BACK_"..i):ChangeImage( "../Data/6_ui/Pvp/pvpBg0"..head.."_0"..tail..".tga" ) end

FORM.SCRIPT: Clear_FireLoveRemainSMS() if( CheckNil(g_world == nil) ) then return false end if( CheckNil(g_world:IsNil()) ) then return false end g_world:SetActivaingWorldMap(true) g_world:SetUpdateWorld(false) PlayBgSoundByPath("../BGM/BattleGround.mp3", 1.0, 0 )
if false == IsExerciseType() then UISelf:SetStaticText(GetTextW(450262):GetStr()) else UISelf:SetStaticText("") end

if true == IsLeagueType() then UISelf:Visible(false) else UISelf:Visible(true) if false == IsExerciseType() then UISelf:SetStaticText(GetTextW(450258):GetStr()) else UISelf:SetStaticText(GetTextW(400274):GetStr()) end end

if false == IsExerciseType() then UISelf:SetStaticText(GetTextW(400360):GetStr()) else UISelf:SetStaticText(GetTextW(400314):GetStr()) end

if false == IsExerciseType() then UISelf:SetEnable(true) else UISelf:SetEnable(false) end

UISelf:ClearAllListItem() if PVP_TYPE_KTH == PvPAttrTable["TYPE"] then UISelf:AddNewListItemChar("1000"):GetWnd():SetCustomDataAsInt(1000) UISelf:AddNewListItemChar("2000"):GetWnd():SetCustomDataAsInt(2000) UISelf:AddNewListItemChar("3000"):GetWnd():SetCustomDataAsInt(3000) elseif PVP_TYPE_DM == PvPAttrTable["TYPE"] or PVP_TYPE_ANNIHILATION == PvPAttrTable["TYPE"] then wMin = GetTextW(90003):GetStr() UISelf:AddNewListItemChar("3 " .. wMin):GetWnd():SetCustomDataAsInt(3) UISelf:AddNewListItemChar("5 " .. wMin):GetWnd():SetCustomDataAsInt(5) UISelf:AddNewListItemChar("7 " .. wMin):GetWnd():SetCustomDataAsInt(7) UISelf:AddNewListItemChar("10 " .. wMin):GetWnd():SetCustomDataAsInt(10) else end

FORM.SCRIPT: local Wnd = GetUIWnd("FRM_PVP_ROOM_ATTR") if Wnd:IsNil() then return end local SubWnd = Wnd:GetControl("IMG_TAB_TIMELIMIT") if SubWnd:IsNil() then return end if PVP_TYPE_KTH == PvPAttrTable["TYPE"] then SubWnd:SetStaticText(GetTextW(200163):GetStr()) PvPAttrTable["GAMEPOINT"] = UISelf:GetCustomDataAsInt() SetEditPvP_Point( PvPAttrTable["GAMEPOINT"] ) elseif PVP_TYPE_DM == PvPAttrTable["TYPE"] or PVP_TYPE_ANNIHILATION == PvPAttrTable["TYPE"] then SubWnd:SetStaticText(GetTextW(400325):GetStr()) PvPAttrTable["GAMETIME"] = UISelf:GetCustomDataAsInt() SetEditPvP_Time( PvPAttrTable["GAMETIME"] ) else end CloseUI("FRM_SELECT_TIMELIMIT_INROOM")

LIST.SCRIPT:
UISelf:ClearAllListItem() if PVP_TYPE_ANNIHILATION == PvPAttrTable["TYPE"] then UISelf:AddNewListItemChar("3"):GetWnd():SetCustomDataAsInt(3) UISelf:AddNewListItemChar("5"):GetWnd():SetCustomDataAsInt(5) UISelf:AddNewListItemChar("7"):GetWnd():SetCustomDataAsInt(7) UISelf:AddNewListItemChar("9"):GetWnd():SetCustomDataAsInt(9) elseif PVP_TYPE_LOVE == PvPAttrTable["TYPE"] then UISelf:AddNewListItemChar("5"):GetWnd():SetCustomDataAsInt(5) UISelf:AddNewListItemChar("7"):GetWnd():SetCustomDataAsInt(7) UISelf:AddNewListItemChar("9"):GetWnd():SetCustomDataAsInt(9) end
local kSize = UISelf:GetSize() local iCount = UISelf:GetListItemCount() kSize:SetY(23 * iCount + 5) UISelf:SetSize(kSize)
local kParentSize = UISelf:GetParent():GetSize() kParentSize:SetY(23 * iCount + 5) UISelf:GetParent():SetSize(kParentSize)
local OptionBG = UISelf:GetParent():GetControl("FRM_Option_BG") local LocOptionBG = OptionBG:GetLocation() local LocSelf = UISelf:GetLocation() LocOptionBG:SetY( LocSelf:GetY() + kSize:GetY() - 4 ) OptionBG:SetLocation( LocOptionBG )

FORM.SCRIPT: local iWin = UISelf:GetCustomDataAsInt() if iWin > -1 then PvPResult(iWin) end
local iWin = UISelf:GetCustomDataAsInt() if iWin > -1 then PvPResult(iWin) end
if PVP_TYPE_LOVE == PvPAttrTable["TYPE"] then ActivateUI("FRM_RED_BEAR_TIMER") ActivateUI("FRM_BLUE_BEAR_TIMER") else CloseUI("FRM_RED_BEAR_TIMER") CloseUI("FRM_BLUE_BEAR_TIMER") end
if PVP_TYPE_KTH == PvPAttrTable["TYPE"] or PVP_TYPE_LOVE == PvPAttrTable["TYPE"] then UISelf:Visible(false) else UISelf:Visible(true) end

if g_TotalPointWarning_R then g_RedEffect = g_RedEffect + 0.15 if g_RedEffect >= 360 then g_RedEffect = 0 end UISelf:SetAlpha(math.sin(g_RedEffect)) local Wnd = UISelf:GetParent() Wnd:GetControl("FRM_BLUE_EFFECT"):SetAlpha(0) else UISelf:SetAlpha(0) end

if g_TotalPointWarning_B then g_BlueEffect = g_BlueEffect + 0.15 if g_BlueEffect >= 360 then g_BlueEffect = 0 end UISelf:SetAlpha(math.sin(g_BlueEffect)) local Wnd = UISelf:GetParent() Wnd:GetControl("FRM_RED_EFFECT"):SetAlpha(0) else UISelf:SetAlpha(0) end
if PVP_TYPE_KTH == PvPAttrTable["TYPE"] then UISelf:Visible(true) else UISelf:Visible(false) end g_MinimapUpdateTime = GetAccumTime()
if GetAccumTime() - g_MinimapUpdateTime > 0.5 then OnUpdateStrongholdLink() OnUpdateStrongholdTrigger() g_MinimapUpdateTime = GetAccumTime() end
if true == g_Start_Bear_Timer_Red then UVAnimationBearTimer(UISelf, TEAM_RED, 1, 1, 5) end
if true == g_Start_Bear_Timer_Blue then UVAnimationBearTimer(UISelf, TEAM_BLUE, 1, 1, 5) end

IMG.SCRIPT: local RemainTime = OnUpdateUIEmergencyEscape() if RemainTime >= 0 then UISelf:SetGrayScale(true) UISelf:SetStaticText(tostring(RemainTime)..GetTT(9):GetStr()) else UISelf:SetGrayScale(false) UVAnimation(UISelf, 0.5, 1, 2, 1) UISelf:SetStaticText("") end

BUTTON.SCRIPT: local kParent = UISelf:GetParent() if false == kParent:IsNil() then OnClickPvP_KickUser( kParent:GetOwnerGuid(), true ) end UISelf:CloseParent()
local kParent = UISelf:GetParent() if false == kParent:IsNil() then OnClickPvP_EntrustMaster( kParent:GetOwnerGuid(), true ) end UISelf:CloseParent()
if true == OnClickPvP_AskOutBoxBtn(UISelf) then UISelf:CloseParent() end

FORM.SCRIPT: InitAnsBox(UISelf) local kWndMsg2 = UISelf:GetControl("FRM_MESSAGE2") if kWndMsg2:IsNil() == false then kWndMsg2:SetStaticText( string.format(GetTextW(201221):GetStr(), g_iRemainSec ) ) end return

BUTTON.SCRIPT: if true == OnClickPvP_AskOutBoxBtn(UISelf) then UISelf:CloseParent() end
BUTTON.HOTKEY: if true == OnClickPvP_AskOutBoxBtn(UISelf) then UISelf:CloseParent() end

FORM.SCRIPT: Clear_FireLoveRemainSMS() if( CheckNil(g_world == nil) ) then return false end if( CheckNil(g_world:IsNil()) ) then return false end g_world:SetActivaingWorldMap(true) g_world:SetUpdateWorld(false) PlayBgSoundByPath("../BGM/BattleGround.mp3", 1.0, 0 )

BUTTON.SCRIPT:
local kTab = UISelf:GetParent():GetControl("BTN_TAB_TEAM_LIST") if false == kTab:IsNil() then if 1 == UISelf:GetUVIndex() then UISelf:SetUVIndex(3) kTab:SetUVIndex(1)
local kTeamList = UISelf:GetParent():GetControl("SFRM_MAIN_BG_TEAM_LIST") local kTournament = UISelf:GetParent():GetControl("SFRM_MAIN_BG_TOURNAMENT") if false == kTeamList:IsNil() and false == kTournament:IsNil() then kTeamList:Visible(false) kTournament:Visible(true) end end end

local kTab = UISelf:GetParent():GetControl("BTN_TAB_TOURNAMENT") if 1 == UISelf:GetUVIndex() then UISelf:SetUVIndex(3) kTab:SetUVIndex(1)
local kTeamList = UISelf:GetParent():GetControl("SFRM_MAIN_BG_TEAM_LIST") local kTournament = UISelf:GetParent():GetControl("SFRM_MAIN_BG_TOURNAMENT") if false == kTeamList:IsNil() and false == kTournament:IsNil() then kTeamList:Visible(true) kTournament:Visible(false) end end
if false == IsLeagueType() then UISelf:SetEnable(false) else UISelf:SetEnable(false) end

EDIT.SCRIPT: local cust = UISelf:GetCustomDataAsInt() if cust == 0 then UISelf:SetEditFocus(true) UISelf:SetCustomDataAsInt(1) end

STATIC_FORM.SCRIPT: if false == OnTick_InviteLeague(UISelf) then UISelf:GetParent():CloseParent() end
